title: An arrow to match Baskerville
content:
Hello all

I’m designing some temporary signage for a gallery which will be  
set in Baskerville (Monotype version). The sign will say something  
like “shop this way”.

Any suggestions for a beautiful arrow to complement the typeface  
would be appreciated.

Thanks.

comments.content: If it’s not too precious for your style of shop, a [hand](http://web.archive.org/web/20080511103318/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-hands/?refby=typographica) might be appropriate.
